scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json && node scripts/update-build-timestamp.js
scripts.smoke:dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const base=process.cwd(); const main=pkg.main; const types=pkg.types; const mainPath=path.resolve(base, main); const typesPath=path.resolve(base, types); if(!main||!types){console.error('Missing main/types in package.json'); process.exit(1);} if(!fs.existsSync(mainPath)){console.error('Missing main file:', main); process.exit(1);} if(!fs.existsSync(typesPath)){console.error('Missing types file:', types); process.exit(1);} console.log('dist entrypoints OK:', main, types);"
